name: Be Sieged
description:
Be Sieged is not your standard match-3

All play is unrestricted including campaign mode, no 'lives' or limiter on how much you can play

Currently contains:-

  • Infinite mode with highscores
    • Infinite Battle mode
  • Campaign mode
    • Includes multiple levels (added in updates)
    • 4 play modes
      • Defend mode; hold off the attackers for a time limit or push them back by reaching a quota
      • Battle mode; standard match 3 experience with a quota to reach
      • Retreat mode; meet the quota before the enemies retreat
      • Siege mode; destroy the siege machine before it reaches the walls

Future:-

  • More Campaign levels
  • Infinite modes for each game-mode

Supported with ads
